thread.title: Japan's Abe apologizes amid cronyism scandal, vows to revise constitution

title: Japan's Abe apologizes amid cronyism scandal, vows to revise constitution
text:
Japan's Abe apologizes amid cronyism scandal, vows to revise constitution 12:37pm EDT - 01:10 
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, his ratings in a slump amid a suspected cronyism scandal and cover-up, apologized again on Sunday for causing anxiety and loss of confidence in his government. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, his ratings in a slump amid a suspected cronyism scandal and cover-up, apologized again on Sunday for causing anxiety and loss of confidence in his government. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2pF8PlH
